quasars.name: Quasar #2852
quasars.description: A short descriptor of the asset.

assets.title: Spiritually Fashionable
assets.description: Spiritually Fashionable brings the couture of Egúngún a fancifully masked figure at the heart of the traditional religion and culture of the Yorùbá people of West Africa into sharp relief in a way that is critical and innovative.

assets.title: Human Sculptures - Sanja Marušić
assets.description: My photographs are like a physical meditation, and the process of taking the picture is intuitively driven. I often let the landscape, sunlight or shadows, the clothes I’m wearing, or my feelings at that particular moment inspire me. In a way I try to become one with the scene.

assets.title: Guadalupe - Amanda Lopez
assets.description: Guadalupe celebrates Mexico’s beloved patron saint, Our Lady of Guadalupe, while exploring the ways she has impacted my life.

assets.title: ICONS - Parker Day
assets.description: Parker Day's ICONS invites us to approach identity with a sense of play and malleability, and to recognize the forgotten parts of ourselves as we see them reflected in these color-saturated portraits.

assets.title: Spectrum - Brian Vu
assets.description: Spectrum celebrates a community of innovative artists in New York City who present themselves in a new and unapologetic way. In an expanding world of hegemonic social media, Vu embraces the importance of capturing those who carve out their own unique space within it.

assets.title: LIMINAL SPACE - Arclight
assets.description: In LIMINAL SPACE, manipulated self-portraits and photographs of his brother take center stage in a series of digital paintings depicting the two young men involved in mundane activities. The surreal treatment of these banal scenes inject a palpable feeling of nostalgia.

assets.title: Growing Up Travelling - Jamie Johnson
assets.description: I have spent my entire career photographing children all over the world. The last several years I have focused my eyes on the Irish Traveller that live in caravans on the side of the road or in open fields throughout Ireland.

assets.title: Privileged Mediocrity - Kris Graves
assets.description: Privileged Mediocrity by Kris Graves examines systemic unfairness in the United States. Represented by Sasha Wolf Projects.
